forum.name: How Do Ways of Finding Perimeter Connect to Algebraic Thinking?
forum.intro:
In Module 4, you worked on algebraic thinking. For this activity, you will connect that work to the ways students might find perimeters of rectangles.

  • Read Connecting Perimeter to Algebraic Thinking.
  • Share your thoughts in the discussion forum below. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum. Respond to the following:
    • Which methods most closely match the method you used to find perimeters in Session 5.1? Which methods have you seen students use?
    • How might you incorporate algebraic reasoning into lessons about perimeter? Share 1–2 ideas.
  • Choose two other responses in the forum and ask a question about each response. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.)
